page.title: 05A school day in N.Wingfield
page.content: Wednesday is a typical school day.My dad is always the first to get up .He makes a drink for me and my mum.My alarm usually goes off at 7.00.My mum gets up at 7.30 but she does not get dressed until I go to school.At 8.00 my dad goes to work and I wash the pots.I walk to school,to arrive before school starts at 8.50.On Wednesdays, 4th years don't go into Assembly because we go swimming.We come back from swimming after playtime.We have a break and then we do maths.At dinnertime I go to recorder practice.After dinner we do maths or English.Sometimes if we have been good we have a story.At home time,if my mum is on "afters",I go to my grandma's and my dinner is waiting on the table.At 6.00 my dad fetches me and I play out.At 9.00 I go to bed and my mum comes home. Amanda Wallis aged 11
